des:
With the Connekt Smart Modular System skill and Alexa, you can now interact with compatible Connekt smart modules and devices by voice. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa app to link your Connekt account and discover your devices. Find more information about linking Connekt account with Alexa at https://app.connektworld.com/amazon_alexa/alexa_howto.html

After linking your devices will show up in the Alexa app with the same names that you assigned in the Connekt app. 
You can also define device groups in the Alexa app.

After setting up your devices you can say the following:
 - Alexa, turn on Bedroom lights
 - Alexa, turn on Light above TV
 - Alexa, turn off the Fan switch
